name: Office Hours (Danielfib)
description:
Office jobs can often be boring, but with an abusive boss, it becomes almost a survival challenge!

You must survive through the office hours, on the edge of losing your mind to the pressure. You must find ways to relieve yourself of work stress without being caught by your boss!

In this puzzle-survival, you must take risks to relieve stress and don't lose your mind until the end of the day.

Diversifiers

This game was made as a submission for VimJam2: Boss, and follows the following diversifier challenges:

Doing Your Part - Contribute at least one asset from the game to https://opengameart.org/ (https://opengameart.org/content/office-8x8-tileset)

Everything is Tiny - Limit sprites and tiles to 8x8 pixels

Transcend Language - The game has no text (other than title and credits)

How To Play

You must get to the end of the work day without losing your mind to stress!

Use arrows or WASD to move. Use E to interact.

Some areas in the office relieve stress (green), while others accelerate it (red).

If the boss spots you relaxing or spots your desk without you around, he will complain at you and highly accelerate your stress until you get back to work.

Find ways to relieve stress along the work day without your boss noticing and keep your mental health!
